item.description:
YANKEE SWAP night

Bring your most unwelcome or funniest gift to be exchanged.

If funny try to keep it under $10.

Texas hold 'em Night. . At DAMATAS New players welcome, we will teach you how to play. Do [b]not[/b] be discouraged enough not to sign up on the waiting list, if full. There is no charge for this meetup, however it is suggested that you get a drink or something else there. Pizzas are [b]$2.99[/b] on Monday nights.

There will be no gambling chips will have no value.

We eat first, swap, talk a lot, then, after 7 - 7:30 ish, or so, we WILL start playing.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be the one with the decks of cards.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Texas hold 'em AND YANKEE SWAP at DAMATAS in Salem
